name: ContactForm
description: Initial contact form that collects name and email before proceeding to onboarding steps
script: if (window.React) { const modal = document.querySelector('[data-onboarding-modal]'); if (modal) { const event = new CustomEvent('injectState', { detail: { isOpen: true, skipContactForm: false, initialStep: 0 } }); modal.dispatchEvent(event); } }

name: TeamSizeStep
description: Team size selection step - User chooses from predefined team size options
script: if (window.React) { const modal = document.querySelector('[data-onboarding-modal]'); if (modal) { const event = new CustomEvent('injectState', { detail: { isOpen: true, skipContactForm: true, initialStep: 0, data: { name: 'Test User', email: 'test@example.com' } } }); modal.dispatchEvent(event); } }

name: DesignerTypeStep
description: Designer type selection step - User identifies their role in the design process
script: if (window.React) { const modal = document.querySelector('[data-onboarding-modal]'); if (modal) { const event = new CustomEvent('injectState', { detail: { isOpen: true, skipContactForm: true, initialStep: 1, data: { name: 'Test User', email: 'test@example.com', teamSize: '1-5 designers' } } }); modal.dispatchEvent(event); } }

name: TeamLocationStep
description: Team location selection step - User specifies where their team is located
script: if (window.React) { const modal = document.querySelector('[data-onboarding-modal]'); if (modal) { const event = new CustomEvent('injectState', { detail: { isOpen: true, skipContactForm: true, initialStep: 2, data: { name: 'Test User', email: 'test@example.com', teamSize: '1-5 designers', designerType: 'UX/Product Designer' } } }); modal.dispatchEvent(event); } }

name: TechStackStep
description: Tech stack selection step - User chooses their primary technology stack
script: if (window.React) { const modal = document.querySelector('[data-onboarding-modal]'); if (modal) { const event = new CustomEvent('injectState', { detail: { isOpen: true, skipContactForm: true, initialStep: 3, data: { name: 'Test User', email: 'test@example.com', teamSize: '1-5 designers', designerType: 'UX/Product Designer', teamLocation: 'SF' } } }); modal.dispatchEvent(event); } }

name: GitHubAccessStep
description: GitHub integration step - User can connect their GitHub account or skip this step
script: if (window.React) { const modal = document.querySelector('[data-onboarding-modal]'); if (modal) { const event = new CustomEvent('injectState', { detail: { isOpen: true, skipContactForm: true, initialStep: 4, data: { name: 'Test User', email: 'test@example.com', teamSize: '1-5 designers', designerType: 'UX/Product Designer', teamLocation: 'SF', techStack: 'React/Next.js' } } }); modal.dispatchEvent(event); } }

name: FinalStep
description: Final welcome step - Confirms successful onboarding completion
script: if (window.React) { const modal = document.querySelector('[data-onboarding-modal]'); if (modal) { const event = new CustomEvent('injectState', { detail: { isOpen: true, skipContactForm: true, initialStep: 5, data: { name: 'Test User', email: 'test@example.com', teamSize: '1-5 designers', designerType: 'UX/Product Designer', teamLocation: 'SF', techStack: 'React/Next.js', githubAccess: true } } }); modal.dispatchEvent(event); } }

name: ErrorState
description: Error handling state - Displays error message when API calls fail
script: if (window.React) { const modal = document.querySelector('[data-onboarding-modal]'); if (modal) { const event = new CustomEvent('injectState', { detail: { isOpen: true, skipContactForm: false, initialStep: 0, error: 'Failed to save data - Network error occurred' } }); modal.dispatchEvent(event); } }

name: ValidationErrorState
description: Validation error state - Shows form validation errors
script: if (window.React) { const modal = document.querySelector('[data-onboarding-modal]'); if (modal) { const event = new CustomEvent('injectState', { detail: { isOpen: true, skipContactForm: false, initialStep: 0, error: 'Please enter a valid name and email address' } }); modal.dispatchEvent(event); } }
